DOC.brief_summary: To compare the effects of the combination of ETN and MTX to MTX alone on radiographic change and clinical disease activity in subjects with early RA over 12 months.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Etanercept and Methotrexate vs. Methotrexate Alone in Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Satisfies the 1987 ACR Revised Criteria for Rheumatoid Arthritis Has RA greater than or equal to 3 months and less than or equal to 2 years Received any previous treatment with MTX Received any previous treatment with ETN or other tumour necrosis factor antagonist
